import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Container from '../Container/Container' import styles from './NavBar.module.scss' import Logo from '../../images/logo.svg' export class NavBar extends Component { state = { headNumber: '', numberIsLoaded: false, social: {}, socialIsLoaded: false } componentDidMount() { axios.get(`/wp-json/wp/v2/phone-numbers/13`) .then(res => this.setState({ headNumber: res.data.title.rendered, numberIsLoaded: true })) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } render() { const { headNumber, numberIsLoaded } = this.state if (numberIsLoaded) { return (
{headNumber}
) } return null } } export default NavBar
